per_frame_1=warp = 0;
per_frame_2=wave_r = wave_r + 1.2*(0.25*sin(1.25*time) + 0.2*sin(2.1*time));
per_frame_3=wave_b = wave_b + 1.2*(0.25*cos(1.25*time) + 0.2*cos(2*time));
per_frame_4=wave_g = wave_g + 1.2*(0.28*sin(1.2*time) + 0.22*cos(1.88*time));
per_pixel_1=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_2=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_3=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=zoom = zoom + sin(0.05*(2.5*sin(2*time*(0.5*cos(64*rad*(sin(1+rad))))*12*dx_r)));
per_pixel_6=zoom = zoom + 0.03*(1-rad);
per_pixel_7=sx = sx + (12.5*sin(0.75*time))*above(rad,0.45)*below(rad,0.8)*dx_r;
per_pixel_8=sy = sy + (12.5*abs(cos((0.5*time))))*above(rad,0.35)*below(rad,0.8)*dy_r;
per_pixel_9=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_10=
per_pixel_11=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_12=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_13=zoom = zoom + 0.01;
per_pixel_14=zoom = zoom + (0.05 + 0.04*sin(time))*(0.2*sin(ang*time));
per_pixel_15=rot = rot + 0.01*(0.5*cos(ang*5*bass*time));
per_pixel_16=
per_pixel_17=dx = dx + 0.1*above(rad,0.25)*dx_r;
per_pixel_18=dy = dy + 0.1*above(rad,0.25)*dy_r;
per_pixel_19=rot=0.1*pow(-ang,3)-1.18*sin(ang);
per_pixel_20=zoom=1.45*sin(-rad)+1.3+ sin(rad);
per_pixel_21=dx = dx + 0.09*sin(q8*0.785);
per_pixel_22=dy = dy + 0.09*sin(q8*0.675);
per_pixel_23=//zoom = zoom +q7;
